review: I had been suffering from excessive menstrual bleeding.i was diagnosed with fibroid uterus which was the main cause for the bleeding problem.i had undergone hysterectomy and there was no complication.I was very much surprised with postoperative care.I was discharged on day 4 of surgery.I resumed to regular work within 3 weeks of surgery. This explains that the perfection  of the surgery.I would recommend Dr.Amishrita and team for any gynaecology surgeries
